query.q: task(T), task_goal(T, '(OBJECT-PLACED-AT ?OBJ ?LOC)'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), add_trajectory('/base_link', S, E, 1.0).
query.text: PR2's path during a pick-and-place sequence

query.q:
findall([Obj, E], 
 ((task_end(T,E), task_class(T,knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(T, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj))), 
 Objs),!, member([Obj, E], Objs), belief_at(loc(Obj,Loc), E), 
 add_object_as_semantic_instance(Obj, Loc, E, SemanticMapInstance), 
 add_object_with_children(SemanticMapInstance).
query.text: Where were the objects perceived during the execution?

query.q:
findall(E,((task_end(T,E), task_goal(T,'PUTDOWN'))), Es),!, member(E, Es), 
 mng_robot_pose_at_time(pr2:'PR2Robot1','/map',E,Pose),
 add_robot_as_basic_semantic_instance(Pose, E, SemanticMapInstance), 
add_object_with_children(SemanticMapInstance), 
highlight_object(SemanticMapInstance).
query.text: What were the robot poses during all PUT-DOWN Actions?
Where was the robot localized at the time of a successful putdown?

query.q:
task_start(T,S), task_end(T,E), task_goal(T,'PUTDOWN'),
 arm_used_for_manipulation(T, Link), add_trajectory(Link, S, E, 0.1).
query.text: What is the trajectory of the arm during a PUT-DOWN Action?

query.q:
task_start(T,S), task_end(T,E), 
task_goal(T,'REPLACEABLE-FUNCTION-DEMO-PART-POURING'), publish_designator(T), 
add_trajectory('/r_wrist_roll_link', S, E, 0.1), 
!, mng_robot_pose_at_time(pr2:'PR2Robot1','/map',S,Pose), 
add_object_with_children(pr2:'PR2Robot1',S).
query.text: What is the trajectory of the arm during the pouring Action?
Stop publishing trajectories to the scene

query.q:
owl_parse('/var/roslog/exp-2014-04-01_11-09-16/cram_log.owl', false, false, true),
owl_parse('/var/roslog/exp-2014-04-01_12-16-27/cram_log.owl', false, false, true),
owl_parse('/var/roslog/exp-2014-04-01_13-17-38/cram_log.owl', false, false, true),
owl_parse('/var/roslog/exp-2014-04-01_14-56-13/cram_log.owl', false, false, true).

findall(Type-Num, (owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'CRAMFailure'),
 rdf_split_url(_, Type, T),findall(F, failure_type(F, T), Failures),
 length(Failures, Num)), Distrib),pairs_keys_values(Distrib, Types, Nums),
 add_diagram(errordist, 'Error distribution', piechart, xlabel, ylabel, 350, 350, '11px', [[Types, Nums]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in the chart
